stateDiagram

SPLASH

SPLASH : SPLASH

SPLASH : enter / #123; show_splash()#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : enter / #123; show_home()#59; #125;

state MAIN_MENU {

        state "$initial_state" as MAIN_MENU.(InitialState)

        MAIN_MENU_1

        MAIN_MENU_1 : MAIN_MENU_1

        MAIN_MENU_1 : enter / #123; show_main_menu1()#59; #125;

        MAIN_MENU_2

        MAIN_MENU_2 : MAIN_MENU_2

        MAIN_MENU_2 : enter / #123; show_main_menu2()#59; #125;

}

state SOLAR_STATS {

        state "$initial_state" as SOLAR_STATS.(InitialState)

        SOLAR_STATS_1

        SOLAR_STATS_1 : SOLAR_STATS_1

        SOLAR_STATS_1 : enter / #123; show_solar_stats1()#59; #125;

        SOLAR_STATS_2

        SOLAR_STATS_2 : SOLAR_STATS_2

        SOLAR_STATS_2 : enter / #123; show_solar_stats2()#59; #125;

        SOLAR_STATS_3

        SOLAR_STATS_3 : SOLAR_STATS_3

        SOLAR_STATS_3 : enter / #123; show_solar_stats3()#59; #125;

}

state BATTERY_STATS {

        state "$initial_state" as BATTERY_STATS.(InitialState)

        BATTERY_STATS_1

        BATTERY_STATS_1 : BATTERY_STATS_1

        BATTERY_STATS_1 : enter / #123; show_battery_stats1()#59; #125;

        BATTERY_STATS_2

        BATTERY_STATS_2 : BATTERY_STATS_2

        BATTERY_STATS_2 : enter / #123; show_battery_stats2()#59; #125;

        BATTERY_STATS_3

        BATTERY_STATS_3 : BATTERY_STATS_3

        BATTERY_STATS_3 : enter / #123; show_battery_stats3()#59; #125;

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

SPLASH --> HOME : RIGHT

HOME --> MAIN_MENU : RIGHT

MAIN_MENU --> HOME : LEFT

MAIN_MENU.(InitialState) --> MAIN_MENU_1

MAIN_MENU_1 --> MAIN_MENU_2 : DOWN

MAIN_MENU_1 --> SOLAR_STATS : RIGHT

MAIN_MENU_2 --> MAIN_MENU_1 : UP

MAIN_MENU_2 --> BATTERY_STATS : RIGHT

SOLAR_STATS --> MAIN_MENU_1 : LEFT

SOLAR_STATS.(InitialState) --> SOLAR_STATS_1

SOLAR_STATS_1 --> SOLAR_STATS_2 : DOWN

SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS_3 : DOWN

SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS_1 : UP

SOLAR_STATS_3 --> SOLAR_STATS_2 : UP

BATTERY_STATS --> MAIN_MENU_2 : LEFT

BATTERY_STATS.(InitialState) --> BATTERY_STATS_1

BATTERY_STATS_1 --> BATTERY_STATS_2 : DOWN

BATTERY_STATS_2 --> BATTERY_STATS_3 : DOWN

BATTERY_STATS_2 --> BATTERY_STATS_1 : UP

BATTERY_STATS_3 --> BATTERY_STATS_2 : UP

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH
Events
settings
